verbose_text: In this study, we examined the mechanisms through which a Pyropia yezoensis peptide [PYP1] induces the proliferation of IEC-6 cells, a rat intestinal epithelial cell line, and the involvement of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) signaling pathway.
